title: Wait Times Scandal At VA Moves To Front Burner
teaser: President Obama promised accountability for problems at the Department of Veterans Affairs after meeting with Secretary Eric Shinseki. The secretary has been on the hot seat since allegations surfaced last month about a possible cover-up of long wait times at a Phoenix VA medical center.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
